bibl.title: Studies in the Later History of Nubia.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: Liverpool Annals of Archaeology and Anthropology 24 (1937) pp. 69-105. - I. The Blemmyes or Beja. - II. Blemmyes and Nubians in the Fifth Century. - III. The Blemmyes and Nubians and Coptic Christianity. - IV. The Development of Christianity in Lower Nubia in the Sixth and Seventh Century.
bibl.seg: KIRWAN Laurence P., Studies in the Later History of Nubia.

Laurence P. KIRWAN (Sir), Studies on the History of Late Antique and Christian Nubia, edited by Tomas HÄGG, László TÖRÖK and Derek A. WELSBY = Variorum. Collected Studies Series. CS748 (Aldershot - Burlington, Vermont, 2002) article XXV.

Reproduit de: Liverpool Annals of Archaeology and Anthropology 24 (1937) pp. 69-105. - I. The Blemmyes or Beja. - II. Blemmyes and Nubians in the Fifth Century. - III.
